prompt:
You are a supply chain graph assistant.
    Use ONLY the provided Cypher results to answer the question.
    If results are empty or insufficient, say so clearly.

    Schema / Ontology:
    Nodes:
- Product {id, name}
- Component {id, name}
- Supplier {id, name, country}
- Factory {id, name, country}
- Port {id, name, country}
- Country {name}

Relationships:
- (Product)-[:USES]->(Component)
- (Component)-[:SUPPLIED_BY]->(Supplier)
- (Supplier)-[:SUPPLIES]->(Component)
- (Factory)-[:PRODUCES]->(Product)
- (Supplier)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(Country)
- (Factory)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(Country)
- (Port)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(Country)
- (Supplier)-[:SHIPS_TO {row_id, cost_usd, time_days, co2_kg}]->(Factory)
- (Factory)-[:EXPORTS_VIA {row_id, cost_usd, time_days, co2_kg}]->(Port)
- (Port)-[:IMPORTS_TO {row_id, cost_usd, time_days, co2_kg}]->(Country)

IDs:
- product_id, component_id, supplier_id, factory_id, port_id are node ids.


    Scenario:
    No scenario constraints applied.

    Question:
    What products are impacted by an asteroid impact in Vietnam? Please consider the whole supply chain

    Cypher Results:
    [{'cypher': 'MATCH (p:Product)-[:USES]->(comp:Component)<-[:SUPPLIES]-(s:Supplier)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(c:Country {name: $country}) RETURN DISTINCT p.name AS impacted_product', 'params': {'country': 'Vietnam'}, 'reason': 'Identify products that use components supplied by suppliers located in Vietnam.', 'row_count': 3, 'rows': [{'impacted_product': 'Product Alpha'}, {'impacted_product': 'Product Beta'}, {'impacted_product': 'Product Gamma'}]}, {'cypher': 'MATCH (p:Product)-[:USES]->(comp:Component)<-[:SUPPLIES]-(s:Supplier)-[:SHIPS_TO]->(f:Factory)-[:EXPORTS_VIA]->(port:Port)-[:IMPORTS_TO]->(c:Country {name: $country}) RETURN DISTINCT p.name AS impacted_product', 'params': {'country': 'Vietnam'}, 'reason': 'Identify products that depend on suppliers who ship to factories that export through ports to Vietnam.', 'row_count': 0, 'rows': []}, {'cypher': 'MATCH (p:Product)-[:USES]->(comp:Component)<-[:SUPPLIES]-(s:Supplier)-[:SHIPS_TO]->(f:Factory)<-[:PRODUCES]-(p) RETURN DISTINCT p.name AS impacted_product', 'params': {}, 'reason': 'List all products impacted by suppliers who ship components to factories producing those products.', 'row_count': 0, 'rows': []}]

    Answer:
